game.title: The Quest of the Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the hidden amulet to restore peace to the kingdom.
game.description: In this epic adventure, you must explore ancient ruins and decipher clues left by a wise sage.
game.reward: A precious amulet, 50 gold coins, and 10 experience points.
